snippet.title: Drunk Fist - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Link to the game : https://nicolasmcls.itch.io/drunk-fist

There’s cockroaches in the mall!  I’ve gotta punch’em’all!
Use your alcoholic skills to escape from a strange infested mall in this crazy first-person game !

You're trapped with dozens of cockroaches around. To escape, you have to activate the switch in the arcade room, and in the butchery. Throw bottles in the wall trash cans to raise the fences and access the rooms. Once the exit is open, go on and get out of this god damn mall ! Good luck. 

Controls :
WASD for movements
E to grab bottles and drink it.
Mouse Click to Punch
Right Click to throw bottles
This game was made during the LudumDare49 which theme was "Unstable".

Guillaume Lefebvre : Lead Programmer
Antoine Nisoli : Programmer support
Loïc Mouray : Game Design 
Antoine Cuvilliez : Game Art
Pierre Morreel : Game Art & Level design
Nicolas Revillon : Game Art
François Surma : Sound Design (Soundcloud)
Logan Berdah & Julien Prost : Music composer (Soundcloud)
